product_name: Outdoor Research Runout Convertible Pants - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: These lightweight convertible pants sport climbing-specific features like ripstop fabric and a low-profile waist and back-thigh pocket, so you stay nimble on the crag or scrambling wall.
short_description: These lightweight convertible pants sport climbing-specific features like ripstop fabric and a low-profile waist and back-thigh pocket, so you stay nimble on the crag or scrambling wall.
